resource.item: Required to create Promerium on your ship and in the Skylab.
Created from Prometid (10) and Duranium (10). Requires: Xenomit
The Starjet's top model: Small, maneuverable, but very deadly!
The best star hunter: There's (almost) nothing for you to fear with this ship!
The ultimate Battlecruiser: The only true ship for pro space pilots!
The Citadel, also known as the group's "tank", is a heavy-duty cruiser with two slots for rocket-launchers and the following abilities:
The Aegis, also known as the must-have for every battle, is a medium-duty engineering ship featuring the following abilities:
The Spearhead, also known as the group's scout, is a light-duty recon ship boasting the following abilities:

Looking for more experience points? Then get the new Adept design. It'll give you a 10% bonus on all experience points gained in the game!

Fly around in this slick design and watch your enemies die with envy!

Honor to whom honor is due! The impressive Corsair design awards you with an extra 10% honor points earned in the game.

Earn your just reward for your heroism and get this design.

This design will let you dish out 5% more damage and completely change the look of your Vengeance Starfighter. It will also give you the unique "Afterburner" ability which you can use to boost your ship's speed by 30% for a period of five seconds!
A special design for the Goliath. You can only use it if you already own a Goliath.
A special design for the BigBoy. You can only use it if you already own a BigBoy.
A special design for the Goliath. You can only use it if you already own a Goliath.
A special design for the Goliath. You can only use it if you already own a Goliath.
A special design for the Goliath. You can only use it if you already own a Goliath.

A 5% damage bonus makes the Enforcer Goliath design a force to be reckoned with and a must for every clan. Its destructive power is revolutionizing the art of warfare - it'll strike terror into the hearts of enemy clans and aliens.

Thanks to its 5% damage bonus, you can count on the Revenge Vengeance design to deal the death blow in any encounter - the kind of advantage that can truly make a difference. This is your best bet for counterattacks on enemy clans or quick alien kills.
Thanks to its 10% shield strength bonus, the Bastion design is the perfect defense in every combat situation. Even the most powerful enemies and aliens will have a hard time taking you down.
The Avenger design's 10% extra shield power makes it a must-have in every space battle.
A sleek and glossy white design. It'll grant you a 10% bonus on all the experience points you collect!
This new red design will win you 10% more honor points while striking fear into the hearts of your enemies.

This design not only gives your Goliath Battlecruiser a completely new look but it also lets you repair your ship hull and the hulls of group members immediately with the "Nano-Cluster Repairer". It also increases your shield power by 10%.

This design doesn't just change the look of your Goliath Battlecruiser. Use its "Weaken Shield" ability to increase damage to enemy shields by 50%, though your shield's strength will be reduced by 30% once the effect wears off. Not only that, but you'll also do an extra 5% damage.

Change the look of your Goliath Battlecruiser and render enemy laser attacks almost useless with this design's "prismatic shielding" capability. It'll also temporarily weaken your own lasers, but give you 10% more shield power in return.

Give your Goliath Battlecruiser a futuristic new look with the Sentinel design. Its "fortress" capability will give your shields a massive power boost, and you'll also benefit from a 10% shield bonus.
Breathe life into your Goliath Battlecruiser with this brand-new design. It'll give your ship a 5% damage bonus and its singularity function will give you a massive damage boost temporarily.
A special design for the Goliath Battlecruiser. You can only use it if you already own a Goliath.
Kick design for the Goliath with a 10% shield bonus. Soccer crazy? Then act now and show off your passion for the beautiful game!
Referee design for the Goliath. Exude authority with this design and increase your damage by 5%.
Goal design for the Goliath with a 10% XP bonus. Soccer crazy? Then act now and bring soccer to space.

Developed by the brilliant minds on Yeni'turkiye Station, the Pusat Vengeance design features a rich arsenal of lasers and generators for delicious, hard-hitting firepower at the expense of armour. Strike hard and fast when you're at its helm.

As precise and potentially deadly as a scalpel, the new Surgeon design for the Goliath won't fail to impress, with a 6% greater damage output, 6% more Honor Points earned, 6% more XP earned, and an additional Generator Slot. Equip yourself with the very latest innovation to come out of our R&D department.
You have earned the right to this design, to commemorate your gold medal in the Ultimate Battle Arena.
You have earned the right to this design, to commemorate your silver medal in the Ultimate Battle Arena.
You have earned the right to this design, to commemorate your bronze medal in the Ultimate Battle Arena.
The excitement and danger of the Ultimate Battle Arena are worth commemorating - and now, with the Iron Goliath, you can fly your souvenir!
The Solemn Design for the Bigboy gives you a 10% bonus on all experience points gained!
The Veteran Design for the Spearhead ship comes with a 5% bonus to XP and Honor Points. Take point as the Spearhead of any offensive with a scout ship in a class of its own!
The Veteran Design for the Aegis ship comes with a 5% bonus to XP and Honor Points. You can be confident that your squad will benefit from the best supply ship available under your Aegis!
The Veteran Design for the Citadel ship comes with a 5% bonus to XP and Honor Points. Raise your Citadel to the sky with this astonishing flying fortress!

Not only does this design look menacing, it comes with 5% more damage plus the following changes to the duration of the Spearhead's skills: 50% increase for Ultimate Cloak and Recon skills and 25% decrease for Target Marker. The cool down of the JAMX will be increased by 15%. Make your Spearhead an elite force to be reckoned with!

Not only does this design look menacing, it comes with 5% more damage plus the following changes to the duration of the Aegis' skills: 50% increase for Repair Pod, 20% decrease for Shield Repair and 10% decrease for HP Repair.

Not only does this design look menacing, it comes with 5% more damage plus the following changes to the duration of the Citadel's skills: 50% increase for Protection, 50% increase for Draw Fire, 25% decrease in Fortify and 15% decrease for Travel. Make your Citadel an elite force to be reckoned with!
The Centaur Goliath Design has an unbeatable 10% Hitpoint Bonus. Act now and fortify your defenses.

A special, limited edition Goliath, the Vanquisher design is only available to pilots who are truly loyal to MMO. It will not only provide a 5% bonus to all Influence earned for MMO, but will also grant a 7% damage bonus against rival human pilots.

A special, limited edition Goliath, the Sovereign design is only available to pilots who are truly loyal to EIC. It will not only provide a 5% bonus to all Influence earned for EIC, but will also grant a 7% damage bonus against rival human pilots.

A special, limited edition Goliath, the Peacemaker design is only available to pilots who are truly loyal to VRU. It will not only provide a 5% bonus to all Influence earned for VRU, but will also grant a 7% damage bonus against rival human pilots.
A special design for the Goliath. You can only use it if you already own a Goliath.
A special design for the Nostromo. You can only use it if you already own a Nostromo.

Onu kullandığın sürece, topladığın bütün Hasar Puanları için % 5 ve bütün Şeref Puanı için % 10 bonus kazanırsın. Goliath için özel bir tasarım. Sadece bir Goliath sahibi olunduğunda kullanılabilinir.
Small laser: causes up to 40 damage points per round
Average laser: causes up to 60 damage points per round
Strong laser: causes up to 100 damage points per round
Much stronger laser: Causes up to 150 damage points per round
Uber laser: Causes up to 200 damage points per round.

This rocket launcher makes it possible to win a battle before it's even begun. One little rocket makes a world of difference on the battlefield - firing up to 3 rockets, this rocket launcher unleashes a broadside of destruction, giving a whole new meaning to the word firepower. This highly sophisticated piece of weaponry can only be equipped with specially designed rockets.

This upgraded version of the Hellstorm launcher 1 makes it possible to win the battle before it's even begun. One little rocket makes a world of difference on the battlefield - firing up to 5 rockets, this rocket launcher unleashes a broadside of destruction, giving a whole new meaning to the word firepower. This highly sophisticated piece of weaponry can only be equipped with specially designed rockets.
Short-range rocket: causes up to 1,000 damage points per rocket fired
Mid-range rocket: causes up to 2,000 damage points per rocket fired
Long-range rocket: causes up to 4,000 points per rocket fired
This plasma charger causes a 40% reduction of your target's accuracy for 5 secs.

Each rocket inflicts a max. of 6,000 HP of damage, but has a lower accuracy rate due to its impressive firepower.
An exceptional weapon when used in combination with the Tech Center's precision targeter.
Hit your opponent with a deceleration rocket to slow them down by %AMOUNT%% for %TIME% seconds

Proximity mine:
50% shield damage upon detonation; combinable with other mine types

Proximity mine:
20% direct damage calculated from ship's base HP and pilot-bio upgrades - powerful enough to destroy enemy ships entirely!
Cause extensive damage to aliens of max. 7,500 per shot! On other pilot's ships, they only cause a max. 4,000 damage per hit.
Slows your opponent for %TIME% seconds by %AMOUNT%%. Furthermore, it takes effect in just 1 second.
A mine that damages other players and infects them with virulent spores.

Give your foes a frosty reception! Hit your target and render it motionless for a whole two seconds. EMPs as well as the abilities "Afterburner" (Lightning ship design) and "Travel" (Citadel) can protect you against these freezing long-range rockets!
Hologram-emitter rocket: It creates a temporary hologram around a ship to alter its actual appearance.
Budget fireworks. Despite their size, they really create an explosive display.
A superior class of fireworks: Magnificent explosions let you temporarily light up the dark galaxy.
First-rate fireworks: Spectacular explosions make others turn green with envy.
Light the fuse on these special fireworks to show everyone in orbit your true colors!

The EMP burst will release an electromagnetic impulse wave to temporarily short-circuit your enemies' onboard instruments and disable their targeting devices. If you're really lucky, the burst will also uncloak them, allowing you to shoot them out of the sky like birds.

Double the rockets, double the trouble!
Upon being fired from the rocket launcher, these rockets will rapidly descend upon your enemy and scorch their target with a near apocalyptic explosion. Fired off in a broadside, they will cause even more damage, hitting an enemy ship from multiple sides to weaken its hull structure.

Your rocket launcher will fire salvos of UBR-100 rockets. Their optimized warheads are at least 80% more effective against aliens, and they also utilize the multi-angle damage feature of conventional Hellstorm rockets.
The multi-angle damage rocket for smart spenders. Your toughest enemies won't stand a chance against the many broadsides of the ECO Hellstorm.
The Hellstorm SAR-01, a Shield Leeching rocket, is fired from a rocket launcher. An especially good quick-strike weapon!
The Hellstorm SAR-02, a Shield Leeching rocket, is fired from a rocket launcher. An especially good quick-strike weapon!
The combo rocket will help you make a name for yourself. A combination of high damage infliction and Shield Leech is a one-two punch your enemies won't soon forget.
Absolutely bombastic - light up your enemies like Times Square with this special "birthday candle."
Give your foes a frosty reception! Hit your target and briefly slow them to a crawl. EMPs and the JAMX skill can protect you against these freezing long-range rockets!
Improved scanner with a longer range
High-tech scanner with a greater range
This repair bot recovers your ship's hull in 165 seconds
This repair bot recovers your ship's hull in 120 seconds
This repair bot recovers your ship's hull in 105 seconds.
This repair bot recovers your ship's hull in 90 seconds.
Ship stays cloaked until your first attack
WARNING: Enemies can still see cloaked ships on the mini map.
Boosts rockets and lasers with raw materials currently in lab use
Boosts rockets with raw materials currently in lab use
Boosts lasers with raw materials currently in lab use
x2 cargo space thanks to molecular compression
This CPU automatically repairs your drones when they sustain more than 70% damage upon ship destruction, as long as you have enough Uridium or Credits (depends on the drone type). Good for 8 repairs.

This CPU automatically repairs your drones when they have received the maximum damage upon ship destruction, as long as you have enough Uridium or Credits (depends on the drone type). Good for 32 repairs.
Displays diplomacy status on mini map
10 jumps to X-1 home map. You may not jump from farther out than map X-4 and NOT from PvP maps (4-X). May not be used during battle.
Jump to X-1 home map, works everywhere except the pirate sector. 20 total jumps. May not be used during battle.
Automatically buys 10,000 laser rounds if less than 1,000 rounds on board. Settings can be adjusted in Hanger/Manage.
Those who fight deadly diseases must be prepared! The Serum CPU will automatically cure you of any infections or parasites.
With 10 doses, the Serum CPU XL is your strongest ally against parasites and infections. Cure yourself and other players - before it's too late!
Allows you to jump to any of the valid target maps. May not be used during battle.
You have a unique chance to get all popular subscriptions in this ultimate subscriptions bundle. This is a one-time limited offer, check it out now!
We have prepared a unique bundle offer including a Goliath spaceship and some powerful equipment! This is a one-time limited offer, go check it out now!

Right now - and for a limited time only - you can acquire silver Booty Keys, which allow you to open Silver Booty Boxes. You'll have the chance to find Aegis, Citadel or Spearhead Ship Designs, LF-4, or Drone Designs, as well as other great prizes!
Available now for a limited time only - the Red Booty Key deal. Act now and take advantage of this unbelievable doubled chance at getting your own LF-4 laser.
Available now for a limited time only - the Blue Booty Key deal. Act now and take advantage of this unbelievable threefold chance at getting your own LF-4 laser.
Available for a limited time only - the P.E.T. Deal. Get in on this special offer now and enjoy up to 55% savings!
The extra energy deal - now available for a limited time. Act now and profit from these incredible offers with savings of upto 56%!
The jump coupon deal - now available for a limited time only. Act now and profit from these incredible offers with savings of up to 56%!
The log-disk deal: Available now for a limited time only. Act now and rake in up to 160% savings with this unbelievable offer!
The booty key deal: Available now and only for a limited time. Act now and rake in up to 160% savings with this unbelievable offer!
Available for a limited time only - the Upgrade Voucher Deal. Act now and enjoy the 100% chances of success when upgrading your items!

Grab this unique package with most rare and useful boosters for just a handful of pennies. You’ll get:
  • DMG-B02 Damage booster (+10% damage, 10 hours, works for the group)
  • SHD-B02 Shield Booster (+25% shield, 10 hours, works for the group)
  • Hp-B02 Hitpoints Booster (+10% hitpoints, 10 hours, works for the group)
with an incredible discount!

Grab this unique package with most rare and useful boosters for just a handful of pennies. You’ll get:
  • DMG-B02 Damage booster (+10% damage, 10 hours, works for the group)
  • SHD-B02 Shield Booster (+25% shield, 10 hours, works for the group)
  • Hp-B02 Hitpoints Booster (+10% hitpoints, 10 hours, works for the group)
with an incredible discount!

Special packs of boosters and ammo – hurry before they're gone! Whether you prefer to fly aggressively, defensively, or both, you can pounce on an amazing deal tailored for you, featuring limited availability items for a fantastic price.
Brought to you by the Helix: don't miss out on the new Ultra versions of Red and Blue Booty, along with a tripled chance at excellent prizes!
Brought to you by the Helix: don't miss out on the new Ultra versions of Red and Blue Booty, along with a tripled chance at excellent prizes!
Automatically buys 500 rockets of the selected rocket type when you have less than 100 left on board. To set the rocket type, click on Hangar/Manage.
Automatically buys 10,000 units of P.E.T. fuel when your fuel reserves fall below 1000 units.
25% less cool-down time for mines and items made from mines
50% less cool-down time for mines and items made from mines
Automatic rocket rapid-fire in laser attacks you start
After installation is completed, the AROL-X CPU must be activated on the space map in "CPUs".
10 ship cloakings (active until your first attack)
WARNING: Enemies can still see cloaked ships on the mini map.
Cloak your ship 50 times and stay invisible until you launch an attack yourself.
WARNING: Enemies can still see cloaked ships on the mini map.
Instant bomb made from 10 ACM-1 mines and 100 Xenomit; doesn't cause any damage to your ship
It has the same cool-down time as mines.
3-second protection against all attacks. Costing 10 ACM-1 mines and 100 Xenomit.
It has the same cool-down time as mines.
Automatically gives your generators a boost using the best resources available
25% less chance that lasers will miss their target; 10 Xenomit used per volley
Click on the CPUs button in the shortcut bar to activate targeting guidance. Only one targeting guidance CPU is allowed per configuration.
50% less chance that lasers will miss their target; 10 Xenomit used per volley
Click on the CPUs button in the shortcut bar to activate targeting guidance. Only one targeting guidance CPU allowed per configuration.
Automatically activates a third configuration. It's good to have this item; it'll do the work for you.
Log-disks can be exchanged for pilot points.
The rocket-launcher CPU automatically reloads your rocket launcher with a specified rocket type to rain fire on your enemies when you launch a laser attack.
After installation is completed, the RL-LB1 CPU must be activated on the space map in "CPUs".
Used to open pirate booty and collect the valuable treasure contained within.

With the HM7 trade drone, you can sell your ore no matter what orbit you're in. Why waste time going back to the space station?
Valid for 100 transactions.
You already have an unlimited trade drone.
You already have an active trade drone. If you buy this trade drone now, you'll receive 100 more transactions.
Only one of these items is allowed per configuration.
Low efficiency for a low price
More bang for your buck: x2 laser damage per round
The best standard laser ammo: x3 laser damage per round
Radioactive elite ammo with x4 damage power available for limited time only!
Special ammunition that reinforces your Shield, strengthening it by tapping into enemy shields (Shield Leech).
One type of ammo you just can't do without: Rain death on your enemies when you fire off a rapid laser salvo.
Combo 100 is a rare ammunition that inflicts the damage of the MCB-50 ammo along with half of the SAB-50 ammo's Shield Leech effect.
Die Jack-O-Battery is a rare Halloween Ammo that causes 3.5 times the damage to NPCs and twice the damage to other players.
This special-order ammo developed from rare Radiatium packs a wallop: 4 times stronger than conventional lasers when used on anything but Demaner hulls, against which it deals 8-fold damage!
4 times stronger than conventional lasers, this ammunition also disperses virulent spores that infect other players.
Too many drones; you can't buy any more.

Booster subscription was stopped until there are enough funds available
If you already have this booster, and you buy another one, your booster subscription will be extended.

If you have a booster subscription, a new booster of the same type will be bought shortly before the old one expires. If you don't have enough Uridium in your account to extend your booster subscription, it will be postponed until you do.

Warning: At least one booster in this pack was already partly or fully subscribed to with another pack. If the booster in one of the booster packs subscribed to has expired, the whole pack will be re-booked and all boosters in it will be extended even if they still have time remaining. You will not have to pay more to have individual boosters extended if you have a pack subscription for them.
It doesn't matter what type of ship/equipment you have, you won't lose your booster since it's linked to your account and not your ship/equipment.
